title: Kassa
description: Cassian Andor's reckless search for answers about his past makes him a wanted man.

title: That Would Be Me
description: Cassian attempts to lay low on Ferrix as agents of the law close in.

title: Reckoning
description: Cassian's desperation to avoid arrest leads him to a mysterious man with unknown connections.

title: Aldhani
description: Out of options, Cassian is recruited for a dangerous mission to infiltrate an Imperial garrison.

title: The Axe Forgets
description: Cassian must carefully navigate the distrust inherent in being the new member of a secret operation.

title: The Eye
description: With cover from a spectacular local festival, the Aldhani mission reaches a point of no return.

title: Announcement
description: The repercussions of the Aldhani heist reach all the way to Coruscant, while Cassian returns home.

title: Narkina 5
description: The Empire catches up to Cassian, but are as yet unaware of his identity and past.

title: Nobody's Listening!
description: Under intense scrutiny while imprisoned, Cassian makes allies plan an impossible escape.

title: One Way Out
description: A rare opportunity opens and the time for Cassian and his fellow inmates to act is now.

title: Daughter of Ferrix
description: A fugitive once more, Cassian must make his next move before it is too late.

title: Rix Road
description: Cassian returns home to Ferrix, a tinderbox that is experiencing a spark of rebellion.

title: One Year Later
description: An undercover mission. A sanctuary threatened. A Chandrilan wedding. A chilling Imperial plan.

title: Sagrona Teema
description: Cassian caught in a rebel turf war. Mon's wedding woes mount. The Ferrix survivors face inspection.

title: Harvest
description: Time is running out for everyone.

title: Ever Been to Ghorman?
description: Cassian and Bix adjust to a Luthen safehouse. All eyes are on Ghorman. Wilmon visits Saw Gerrera.

title: I Have Friends Everywhere
description: Cassian on Ghorman. Syril on Coruscant. Bix failing. Wilmon trapped. Kleya has a serious problem.

title: What a Festive Evening
description: Vel and Cinta to Ghorman. Cassian home to Bix. An argument. A heist. A party. Everything at risk.

title: Messenger
description: Yavin is growing. Wilmon comes for help. Dedra's on Ghorman. Cassian heeds the call.

title: Who Are You?
description: Imperial manipulation. Ghorman frustration. Cassian and Syril center stage as Palmo erupts.

title: Welcome to the Rebellion
description: In the Ghorman aftermath, Mon Mothma takes a stand. Cassian must carry out a difficult extraction.

title: Make It Stop
description: Lonni Jung taps out. Dedra closes in. Luthen scrambles. Kleya delivers.

title: Who Else Knows?
description: Cassian returns to Coruscant for one last extraction.

title: Jedha, Kyber, Erso
description: Cassian returns to Yavin with intel that will change everything.
